title: Chicken liver parfait
description: Rich, silky and meltingly delicious, this remains one Raymond's most popular brasserie dishes. Make it two days in advance if possible so the flavours can fully develop and mature.Equipment and preparation: You will need a temperature probe and 23cm x 9cm x 8cm/9in x 3½in x 3in terrine tin.
ingredients: 400g/14oz fresh chicken livers, free-range or organic, sinews and gall bladders removed
2 sprigs thyme, leaves only, finely chopped
400g/14oz unsalted butter, melted and kept warm
